qas.question: What kind of citizenship do the citizens of Saint Helena hold?
On what date was full British citizenship restored to the citizens of the island?
What act restored the full British citizenship of the citizens of Saint Helena?

context: The citizens of Saint Helena hold <a0_0>British Overseas Territories citizenship<a0_0/>. On <a1_0>21 May 2002<a1_0/>, full British citizenship was restored by the <a2_0>British Overseas Territories Act 2002<a2_0/>. See also British nationality law.
